Record.ClassificationPath: Pathological Conditions, Signs and Symptoms/Pathologic Processes/Necrosis/Gangrene
Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Morphologic Finding/Necrotic Change/Gangrene
Record.Description: Death of tissue, usually in considerable mass and generally associated with loss of vascular (nutritive) supply and followed by bacterial invasion and putrefaction.
Death and putrefaction of tissue usually due to a loss of blood supply.
